sentences.sContent: The city had scarcely changed in 20 years.
sentences.sCn: 这座城市20年中几乎没有什么改变。

sentences.sContent: The country had scarcely any industry.
He scarcely ever left the region.
sentences.sCn: 他几乎没有离开过这个地区。

synos.tran: 几乎不，简直不；简直没有

trans.tranCn: 几乎不，简直不；简直没有
trans.tranOther: almost not or almost none at all
